title: Впізнай меня
overview: The plot of the series focuses on the life of the main character Vera, the daughter of a former policeman. Father raised Vera strictly, trying to protect her from the outside world. However, their lives changed dramatically after a tragic incident that left a deep mark on the family. Vera's friend, Kateryna, is her complete opposite - confident, unbridled and defiant. Their friendship surprises even university teachers, as Kateryna is not overly concerned with her studies and is focused on the search for personal happiness. One day she decides to go to the club in search of a successful man, taking Vera with her. How this acquaintance will change their lives, viewers can find out by watching the series.
